Floor 3514: 3,514 tunafish sandwiches for @Deddly

053407152023

new page!

Edited July 15, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Floor 3515: A dimly lit room with a massive obsidian sculpture of the prograde symbol in the middle

Edited July 15, 2023 by pipe
Floor 3516: A thermonuclear reactor powering the whole building

As you make your way to the building's 3517th floor, you see that aforementioned reactor's two cooling radiators are mounted here. Each is the size of a floorball court and glowing red hot. Pretty cool, actually.
Floor 3518: A storage warehouse filled with depleted uranium fuel rods.
Floor 3519: A storage warehouse filled with depleted full uranium fuel rods.

Floor 3520: A 1:1 replica of the city of Memphis Egypt as it was in the 30th Century BCE

110507152023

Floor 3521: A full size replica of Graceland.

Spoiler

The Mississippi Delta was shining
Like a National guitar
I am following the river
Down the highway
Through the cradle of the civil war

I'm going to Graceland
Graceland
In Memphis Tennessee
I'm going to Graceland
Poorboys and Pilgrims with families
And we are going to Graceland
My traveling companion is nine years old
He is the child of my first marriage
But I've reason to believe
We both will be received
In Graceland

She comes back to tell me she's gone
As if I didn't know that
As if I didn't know my own bed
As if I'd never noticed
The way she brushed her hair from her forehead
And she said losing love
Is like a window in your heart
Everybody sees you're blown apart
Everybody sees the wind blow

I'm going to Graceland
Memphis Tennessee
I'm going to Graceland
Poorboys and Pilgrims with families
And we are going to Graceland

And my traveling companions
Are ghosts and empty sockets
I'm looking at ghosts and empties
But I've reason to believe
We all will be received
In Graceland

There is a girl in New York City
Who calls herself the human trampoline
And sometimes when I'm falling, flying
Or tumbling in turmoil I say
Oh, so this is what she means
She means we're bouncing into Graceland
And I see losing love
Is like a window in your heart
Everybody sees you're blown apart
Everybody feels the wind blow

In Graceland, in Graceland
I'm going to Graceland
For reasons I cannot explain
There's some part of me wants to see
Graceland
And I may be obliged to defend
Every love, every ending
Or maybe there's no obligations now
Maybe I've a reason to believe
We all will be received
In Graceland
Floor 3522: A full size replica of Greenland.
Floor 3523: Somehow you find yourself in the Blue Bayou.
Floor 3524: The unknown lost fragment of the Bayou Tapestry.

Floor 3525: a 1:1 recreation of Pompeii in 70CE

020207162023
Floor 3526: Hehe big volcano go boom

Floor 3527: an erupting Yellowstone Super Volcano

072607162023

Floor 3528: Krakatoa. In the building. Erupting. Luckily you find some safety earphones. Somehow the building doesn't shake. Except for the fact that a chunk of floor 3529 is melted.

Edited July 16, 2023 by Aerodynamic Kerbal
Floor 3529: Croco-toe swampcan.
Floor 3530: A Hot Springs day spa. You have a relaing soak.

Floor 3531: A sauna to complement the spa 1 floor down. Enjoy a nice steam.

053807172023
Then on floor 3532, there is a nice 5C° lake in the autumn to swim in right after the sauna'ing
Floor 3533: A 180⁰C indoor pool filled with chicken meat, potatoes and carrots.

Floor 3534: a handbook detailing how Floor 3534 is a floor that has a handbook detailing how Floor 3534 has a handbook detailing how Floor 3534 is a floor that has a handbook detailing how Floor 3534 has a handbook detailing how Floor 3534 has a handbook.

075707172023
Floor 3535: A handbook explaining why the previous floor has a handbook

Floor 3536: a handbook explaining how the handbook on floor 3535 has a handbook explaining why the previous floor, Floor 3534: a handbook detailing how Floor 3534 is a floor that has a handbook detailing how Floor 3534 has a handbook detailing how Floor 3534 is a floor that has a handbook detailing how Floor 3534 has a handbook detailing how Floor 3534 has a handbook.

Floor 3537: A handbook entitled "Handbooks: An end of a saga", which contains the story behind the making of each handbook

Edited July 17, 2023 by Aerodynamic Kerbal
